subject: Re: From Miho Oshima
body:
Dear Beloved Sister Marina.

I received and read your letter with gratitude to God. And I am impressed
with your reply. I am determined to fulfill my last wish on this earth
which is why I will be trusting and believing your sincerity to appropriate
this task accordingly. As a servant of the living God, I will want you to
take your time and pray about this, and re-assure me that you will use this
fund as directed, because the use of this fund for Humanitarian assistance
and charity will be the only way my spirit will be at rest.

I would have to write an authorization letter to my bank here in Thailand,
instructing them to transfer the funds into your bank account. You are
therefore requested to provide me with the below information, so that I can
send an authorization letter to the Thailand bank instructing them to
release the $5,500,000 Dollars into your bank account for humanitarian and
charity work.

1. Your Full Name:
2. Your complete address:
3. Your age:
4. Your occupation and position:
5. A scan copy of any form of your identification:
6. Your direct telephone number:
7. Your bank account information to transfer the funds:

Once I receive the above data from you I will prepare a funds transfer
authorization letter with your information and forward it to my bank to
enable the bank to confirm you as the beneficiary and transfer the funds
into your bank account accordingly.

It is very important that you send to me the above information as quickly
as possible because I am scheduled to go for the cancerous lymph nodes
removal surgical operation in a few days, and I would like to conclude with
all necessary documents and forward the funds transfer Authorization to my
bank before proceeding with the surgery. In the case of my absence, my
assigned lady nurse Ms. Kim Chan, will guide you on what to do to enable my
bank to complete the funds transfer to your bank account. I beg you to be
praying for me for a successful surgical operation in the days ahead.

I pray that God will give you more anointing and wisdom to handle this
project to the Glory of God. Amen.

Thanks and may God bless us all.

My late husband was a trading merchant businessman in Thailand before his
death, so we lived in Thailand for some time before his demise and my
cancer diagnosis.
Best regards,

Mrs. Miho Oshima

subject: Re: From Miho Oshima
body:
Hello Sister Marina,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your trust and the opportunity to assist with your wishes. I will certainly keep you in my prayers for a successful surgical operation.

Before proceeding, could you please provide more details about the fund transfer process? How much is the fund that will be transferred, and what specific charity work do you have in mind for it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Marina

subject: Re: From Miho Oshima
body:
Dear Beloved Sister Marina,

I sent you the below email message earlier today along with a copy of my
passport. Did you receive it?

Greetings, Dear Marina.

I thank you very much for your kind consideration.
I am Mrs. Miho Oshima , I am 75 years old, I attach copy of my passport on
this email for you to be sure who you are communicating with. I am
currently living in Thailand where I am undergoing medical treatment for
throat cancer which unfortunately has spread to my lymph nodes and some
other parts of my body. I was married to Late Mr. Kobayashi Oshima from
Nagasaki who died four years ago, and I inherited the family's business, my
husband and I were married for 17 years without a child, so I am childless
and have no one to inherit my estate when I am gone. I prayed to God asking
him for direction on who to donate the funds to before contacting you, and
I want you to know that I am not asking you for any money, rather I seek
for your trust and honesty in distributing the donation money to poor
Children like motherless, destitute homeless people. I have also donated to
charity organizations in Thailand, Africa and South American countries, but
this time I want to donate the sum of, ( a total sum of $5.5 million USD)
to you as an individual to help distribute it to the homeless children and
destitute around you.

Recently, My health has deteriorated, and my doctors have informed me that
I have a few months to live, and as a result of shock, I was hit by a
partial stroke, which affected my ability to walk, talk or do anything on
my own. Having known my condition I decided to search for a God Fearing
individual whom I can (WILL/DONATE) the funds to enable him/her utilize
this money the way I am going to instruct here. I want an individual that
will use this money to help the poor in the religious houses, orphanage
homes, widows and the destitute. I took the decision to donate this money
to you because I don’t have any child that will inherit this money, and
considering my ill health, I had no choice but to give the money out for
humanitarian assistance.

I sincerely request for your assistance in this humanitarian work. I will
send a funds transfer request letter to my bank instructing them to
transfer the total sum of Five Million, five Hundred Thousand Dollars into
your bank account, then you will use Four Million, Five Hundred Thousand
United States Dollars to help the following people: Motherless babies,
Widows, Disable and the destitute, Helping the poor in religious houses.
The remaining One Million United States Dollars will be for you as a reward
for your good work, and I need you to promise me that you will sincerely
use the money as I mentioned above to carry out the humanitarian project.
Note that there are no risks involved because my late husband acquired the
money through legal means, and the donations funds transfer process will be
followed legally.

Presently I am taking treatments at the Isolated specialist cancer hospital
here in Bangkok, Thailand. I don’t know how long I will be alive, but I am
praying that God should help me.  I am very weak these days and talk very
slowly. I write emails with the help of my assigned lady nurse here Ms. Kim
Chan. She is a trusted lady whom I have known in recent years, she is the
person that helps me access and write emails, sometimes responding to your
emails might be difficult if she's unavailable. I promised God that all my
donations will be done quietly without any publicity, kindly respect my
wish and handle the whole process confidential, as I do not want any
praises from anyone.

As soon as I hear from you, I will give you further details on what you are
required to provide to enable the funds transfer to your bank account.

May the almighty God bless you.

Best regards.
Mrs. Miho Oshima

subject: Re: From Miho Oshima
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's very kind of you to consider donating to help those in need. Can you tell me more about the specific projects or organizations you have supported in the past?

Best wishes,
Marina
